name: Hisense 55" S7N CanvasTV Series QLED 4K Google TV (55S7N) - with Frame
pros: Unique Art Mode transforms the TV into a beautiful piece of decor
Best-in-class 144Hz native refresh rate for ultra-smooth motion
Hi-Matte display eliminates glare and looks like a real canvas
